rows.label: qst103912_msg0001
rows.name:
You want to borrow a ship to start
a regular shipping route, mo?

rows.label: qst103912_msg0002
rows.name:
A money transfer from
Avaritia to Iyasaki Village?

rows.label: qst103912_msg0003
rows.name:
What a touching story, mo! Umon
will lend friends a ship, mo.

rows.label: qst103912_msg0004
rows.name:
...Umon didn't say it was for
free, mo. There's an initial fee
of 2,000G, friends must pay, mo.

rows.label: qst103912_msg0022
rows.name:
Umon will have the ship delivered
to the Avaritia Trade Guild, mo.

rows.label: qst103912_msg0023
rows.name:
However, if you break
it, you pay for it, mo!

rows.label: qst103912_msg0024
rows.name:
It seems like a long journey, so
please protect the ship well, mo.

rows.label: qst103912_msg0041
rows.name:
If friends don't pay money,
Umon cannot lend ship, mo.

rows.label: qst103912_msg0071
rows.name:
To borrow the ship, friends must
pay an initial fee of 2,000G, mo.
